title: Security concerns
text:
I have used this app for many years but this year all of the reservations I have made have received phishing messages through the official messaging section of the booking.com app. The messages look official and state that there is a problem with my credit card that will result in my reservation being cancelled within 24 hours unless I click a link and “verify” my payment. 

Each time I have had to spend nearly an hour on the phone with booking.com to find out that the message is fraudulent. 

There is clearly a problem within the booking.com platform that is not being rectified. Although a warning message has been added to the messaging portion of the app, the problem seems very serious.

I am hesitant to use this platform again in the future.

title: App and customer support are
text:
I would strongly go out of my way to warn my friend and family to avoid booking.com and the app. 

First the app is hard to navigate and I couldn’t find my booking details easily. Even after I found it, there were dark patterns making it very difficult to find out how to cancel my serration. I needed to send a cancelation request to the hotel but that was hidden deep in the workflow. The app is designed to make it difficult to request service

title: Great App
text: We have used Booking for our hotels for many years. Alway easy to use, best prices, and the most preferred app by many destinations. We’ve never worried that they won’t have our names let alone a confirmed reservation- (both have happened with the first travel app I used to use).

title: Best travel agency ever
text:
He utilizado booking.com para mis viajes internacionales y nacionales y hasta hoy todo ha sido exacto como lo esperaba. 

Un solo contratiempo con un taxi booking al llegar a República Dominicana pero fue resuelto al expresar mi queja. 

Tengo vasta experiencia en la hostelería pero siempre utilizo Booking.com para mis hoteles por sus precios ventajosos, la veracidad de sus ofertas y la atención al cliente excepcional.

title: Excellent Hotel Booking Site

title: No communication between app and hotels
text:
I stayed at a hotel back in September and was refused service due to age (the age restriction was very hidden). I was told that I would get my refund and I waited for a few weeks without any refund. I got into contact with both Booking.com and the hotel multiple times over the course of the next few months and just told every time that the other side has the money and they can’t do the refund. Both sides have agreed with me that I deserve the refund but say that they cannot do it. 

At this point, I have given up running around between the two companies and I am out of hundreds of dollars of a hotel I was not even allowed to stay at plus the fact I had to schedule another hotel for that same night to not be stuck on the street.

If you have any issues, don’t expect anyone to figure it out for you as I have had to fight for my refund to no avail.

title: Loved our stay!
text:
Petra and Daniel were wonderful hosts!  They were generous with their time and information. The breakfast was extraordinary on both days. The location is very peaceful and private with a lovely beach just a short drive away. Would absolutely stay again if we were ever in the area.

Anne W

title: Account Disabled for no known reason
text: I’ve used booking for years. I mean… years. I’ve never had a problem with reservations or customer service. Everything has always been great and continuously recommended to anyone. Well, not anymore!!! The last week, all of my reservations were cancelled without my doing and no explanation. I tried reaching out to customer service and the hotels. No responses that I know of because the other day when I went in to check, I found out that my account was disabled!!!! Really?!? WHY?!? No explanation and no response. Nothing. I have never had an issue. I’m really angry about this because I’ve done nothing wrong for this to happen!!! Thus, I don’t recommend the site to anyone anymore. I’m not starting over. I’m done. Thanks for nothing booking.

title: Canceled reservations after check in !!
text: This was one of the most unprofessional experiences of my life!We went to check into our room everything was successful with check in.We wondered why we didn’t receive a door code or apt number.We call they said they would email it. We waited almost 2 hours still received nothing.We called back they said it was canceled!! We asked to speak to a manager the woman on the phone told us no we couldn’t speak to the supervisor. This was a horrible experience and I will not book through this app again!!

text: My husband and I made a last-minute reservation for this location after touring Crystal Bridges Museum. It was amazing. So close and had all the amenities. It was much nicer than any hotel room we could’ve gotten. It was very clean had nice linens, and all the makings for coffee and tea.I would highly recommend this place and stay here again thank you.

text: I completely enjoyed my stay. This was a weekend get away. The check in process was easy and staff were very helpful. We stayed on the 23rd floor. The view was Amazing!!!! The room was exceptional , it felt like home away from home. Super comfortable and relaxing. The cleanliness was top tier. I definitely recommend staying here because we will be back again. We’re family now 😃

title: Absolute Trash App
text:
Ordered hotel on booking.com via Kayak app. Was never sent a confirmation number. Was told to download booking.com app which then instead of displaying my reservation and asking for me to create an account instead just gave me options for creating account. Created with Apple ID. 

Currently have no record of confirmation number which booking.com said is required to access help line. Absolute garbage. Never have I not received a confirmation number via my submitted email. Booking.com though took my money! Garbage. Maybe worst app experience I’ve ever had. And no idea if I have a confirmed reservation. Disgusted.

title: Excelente ayuda
text: El app de Booking es una ayuda que simplifica y nos las mejores opciones de reserva para nuestros viajes. Gracias Booking!!!!
